Method Detail

equalTo

public int equalTo(Triangle tri)
Determines the relationship between this triangle and another triangle

Parameters:
tri - The triangle to be compared to
Returns:
-1 if triangles are never equal, 0 if triangles are equal, 1 if other triangle is 1 clockwise rotation past this triangle, 2 if other triangle is 2 clockwise rotations past this triangle
